title: MD
biography: Chandrakant Lahariya is an Indian medical doctor, public health & policy expert and writer.
aiSummary: Chandrakant Lahariya is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 161 at Immunization strategy (Member). Has been published in JAMA Oncology, The Lancet, The Lancet Respiratory Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
